Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier fire near the tracks near 87th. Service to 95th has resumed, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier fire near the tracks near 87th. Service to 95th has resumed,

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
